name: Welcome to the Jungle (Skill Card)
skill_activation: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
skill_effect: After damage calculation, if you took battle damage from a battle involving an opponent's monster and your Attack Position "Amazoness" monster, that opponent's monster loses ATK/DEF equal to the ATK of the "Amazoness" monster it battled, until the end of this turn.
